fill_in_the_blanks.question: One day, Nyame decided that he would give the pot of wisdom to Anansi
Anansi tried tying the clay pot full of wisdom to his back
The wisdom was free for everyone to share

meanings.stomach: the internal organ in which the major part of the digestion of food occurs
meanings.weave: form fabric by interlacing long threads
meanings.wisdom: the quality of having experience and knowledge

meanings.bottom: the lowest point or part of something
meanings.tool: a device or implement, especially one held in the hand

multiple_choice.question: Where did the god Nyame keep wisdom?
Where was Anansi trying to keep the pot?

multiple_choice.answer: Because his son was cleverer than him
choices: Because he could not climb the tree
multiple_choice.question: Why did Anansi get angry?
